name: Alex Kim
persona: Alex Kim is a 21-year-old Psychology major who has faced some academic challenges, reflected in a CGPA of 2.69. While Alex is moderately motivated to achieve better grades and shows perseverance, self-discipline and confidence in academic abilities could be stronger. Alex tends to manage test anxiety fairly well and is working on building better study habits. With a bit more focus and support, Alex is determined to improve and make the most of the university experience.
